snippet: In Yemen, civilian deaths are turning potential American allies into enemies.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Ibrahim Mothana argues that drone strikes ordered by Pres Obama, and the civilian casualties they cause, are turning potential American allies into enemies; cites case of Yemen, where multiple drone strikes have driven many to join radical militants out of a sense of revenge and despair, rather than ideology.
lead_paragraph: In Yemen, civilian deaths are turning potential American allies into enemies.
